title: 旅行英语 | 机场对话
description: 学习机场常用英语对话和实用表达

subtitles.textEn: Excuse me, where is the check-in counter?
subtitles.textIpa: ɪkˈskjuːz miː, weər ɪz ðə tʃek-ɪn ˈkaʊntər?

subtitles.textEn: It's right over there, next to gate 5.
subtitles.textZh: 就在那边，5号登机口旁边。
subtitles.textIpa: ɪts raɪt ˈoʊvər ðer, nekst tuː ɡeɪt faɪv.
